title: LoRaWAN attack in military use case
authors:
Georges Derache, Mounira Msahli, Aurelien Botbol, Fabien Romain,
  Jerome Champlon, Gauthier Canet
abstract:
The importance of the development of IoT and LoRaWAN in military applications
has been widely established. Since security is one of its important challenges,
in this paper we study two attacks scenarios: replay and sniff attacks on
military LoRaWAN network. The aim is to highlight cybersecurity threats that
must be taken into consideration when using such technology in critical
context.
